newsitem.title: USA: U.S. debt futures build gains, near new peaks.
newsitem.headline: U.S. debt futures build gains, near new peaks.

text.p: July 30 - U.S. debt futures built gains again, hit new peaks. Sept T-bonds inched up to 116-18/32 on dealer, bank buying, with some brokers seeing scant resistance until 116-30/32. Some thought market vulnerable to disappointment if Friday's July US payrolls numbers fail to draw more buyers. But they said budget, tax cut bill optimism kept values supported.
